column1: Kata Robata////After this visit we came back 2 times the same month and brought some friends along. The highlights of the next visits have to the be the duck salad
column3: and the tropical roll. The duck salad was perfectly balance. The lobster macaroni is truly the best in Houston (the servers are not exaggerating to you). I don't like sushi rolls
column4: but this one was an exception - I barely noticed the rice and the sweetness balanced with the fresh fish and overall it was such a clean taste.
